author: Simon Carswell
title: Coronavirus: HSE advised nursing homes last month to manage their own cases
description: Nursing homes were advised by the HSE to manage Covid-19-infected patients in their own facilities and only transfer them to hospitals where it would “confer additional benefit”. The HSE advised nursing homes in a guidance note on March 25th to discuss in adv…
content:
Nursing homes were advised by the HSE to manage Covid-19-infected patients in their own facilities and only transfer them to hospitals where it would confer additional benefit.
The HSE advised nursing homes in a guidance note on March 25th to discuss in adva… [+3890 chars]
